name: 铃声不断 Ring Ring
intro: )   　　After a group of telemarketers get fired by their penny-pinching boss, they take revenge by stealing the company's list of clients to start up their own firm. In the heat of celebration and a few drinks in, they lose the phone which holds the only copy of their future costumers. While tracking the lost device on Halloween night, co-workers Amber and Will find themselves trapped in a demented drug addict's house of horrors.
comments: 禁毒宣传片。女主总是在找手机！
狗屎！SHIT!!一个shab一直在吸大麻
actors: 可比·毕丝·布兰顿 Kirby Bliss Blanton
亚历克斯·沙弗尔 Alex Shaffer
艾莉 格尼诺 Allie Gonino
安德鲁·卡德威尔 Andrew Caldwell
